review: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, with all of its twists and turns, felt like I was riding the Night Bus to Hogwarts. This film never drew away from the nostalgia within the book and the previous films, but brought in new elements that would come into play in later installments.

review: Being a landmark in anime to this day, Hayao Miyazaki's spectacular vision pierces with such wisdom and passion about the advancement of humanity with stunning action, astonishing visuals and fantastic voice work from Billy Crudup, Claire Danes, Minnie Driver and the rest of its cast.

name: princess_mononoke_1999
review: Miyazaki's grandest and most epic film is pretty much his most adult work as well. It also may be his most beautiful film (this or maybe Howl's Moving Castle). This has become one of the greatest anime films of all time, and for good reasons. I love this movie from beginning to end.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: A timeless Christmas classic.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Even though this movie was released in 1947, I still tend to love it unconditionally! If you have never taken the time to watch this film, you must do yourself the favor of doing so! This truly is a timeless classic.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Miracle On 34th Street shows love and joy into the season with it's complex ideas plus the importance of Christmas

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: It is a stellar and heart warming story that bypasses emotional manipulation and embraces sincere sentimentality that is reminiscent of the golden age of filmmaking.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: 5 stars black and white version only!

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Excellent holiday classic! Not a flaw in it! It's a wonderful choice for families, and reminds us all to believe in the magic of the holiday season.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: The best version of the film.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: I think the black-and-white version of "Miracle on 34th Street" is one of the most overrated Christmas movies I've seen on television. I hope NBC should stop playing the movie on Thanksgiving Day next time.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: It was really good! It has good family humour. It also has a good script and storyline. It is a classic that you will love and cherish forever.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Who would ever think that a Santa could be this honest? Classic feel good movie for the holiday, or any time you out want to feel good. Picture if ever employee was this honest as a sales person. Lol

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: The perfect Christmas movie. Wonderful script, acting and just the right touch of whimsy, fantasy, sentimentality including some great fun with New York accents and attitudes.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Enchanting and romantic.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: One of the greatest films ever made! I can watch this year-round and never get tired of Christmas!

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: An absolute classic the whole family can enjoy. Christmas isn't the same without it - has to be the black and white version though!

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Amazing Christmas film

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Classic holiday viewing.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Of course it's sentimental but who cares? This is a traditional Christmas movie that is full of heart, warmth and holiday cheer. It truly teaches us that miracles can certainly come true if you believe in Santa Claus.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: A sentimental classic, sure to delight even the most jaded moviegoer.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: With a kind, wonderful and humorous tone, one of the greatest Christmas movies ever made was created. It has a great Santa and a surprisingly refreshing lack of sexism. Amazing.

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: I've seen the remake and its good. but this is definitely a Christmas classic absolutely loved it my first time seeing this classic and its on bluray wow beautiful!

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street

name: 1013970-miracle_on_34th_street
review: Best Christmas movie ever!
